name: starter-api
description: A quick boilerplate API using FastAPI with Postgres, Docker, NGINX

scripts.makemigrations: docker-compose run web alembic revision --autogenerate -m 'New Migration'
scripts.migrate: docker-compose run web alembic upgrade head
scripts.reset: docker-compose rm -f && docker-compose pull && docker-compose up
scripts.golive: git checkout master && git merge dev && git push && git checkout dev

author: Ragavendra Yarasi
